name: Collector (Alex Calvelage)
description:
GOAL

Avoid the Boxes and collect as many Hearts as you can before getting crushed! Every 20 points, a new life is earned! Beware, every 30 seconds, the Boxes seem to fall faster and faster... Powerups are dropping from the sky as well, be sure to gather those up!

CONTROLS[Keyboard]

*AD or Arrow Keys - Move

Mouse - Navigate Menu

*W, Space, or Up Arrow Key - Jump

*Escape Key - Pause

[Xbox 360/Xbox One Controller] --Others may work, haven't tested any besides these two

*Left Analog/Directional Pad - Move Player / Navigate Menu

*A Button - Jump

*Start - Pause

CREDITS

Programmed by: Alex Calvelage (All0utWar)

Graphics by: Alex Calvelage

Gamepad Buttons by: Nicolae Berbece (Xelu)

http://opengameart.org/users/xelu

ENGINE

Love2D - LÖVE Development Team

https://love2d.org/

FONT

Orator Std Regular

SegoeUI

MUSIC

Techno Caper: Eric Matyas

soundimage.org/action/techno-caper/

LIBRARIES USED

TEsound: Ensayia & Taehl

http://love2d.org/forums/viewtopic.php?f=5&t=2334

EXTRA INFORMATION
  • MacOS and Linux can only play the game via the .love release. You must have the Love2D game engine installed to run the file.
  • There is a 32bit version of the executable that the install button may not show, here's the link to all three different files that are available for download.
